channel.title: Hardware on D0CUM3NTN4T10N
channel.description: Recent content in Hardware on D0CUM3NTN4T10N

item.title: Firmware Analysis
item.description: Static Analysis linkThe following tools are useful for static analysis. Firmwalker firmware-mod-kit file ./firmware binwalk ./firmware # -M: Matryosika (recursively) scan extracted files # -r: Delete carved files after extracting # -e: Extract known file types binwalk -Mre ./firmware # -E: Calculate file entropy # -N: Do not generate an entropy plot graph binwalk -EN ./firmware # firmware-mod-kit ./extract-firmware.sh ./firmware Dynamic Analysis link gdb ./firmware rizin ./firmware Using FIRMADYNE linkFIRMADYNE is a platform for emulation and dynamic analysis of Linux-based firmware.

item.title: SAL Logic Analysis
item.description: Analysis linkSaleae’s Logic Analyzer is a tool for hardware analysis. Download Logic 2 and start it. chmod +x ./Logic-x.x.x-master.AppImage ./Logic-x.x.x-master.AppImage In the analyzer, click “Open a capture” and select the target file such as ".sal". Open “Analyzer” tab on the right of the windows and click on the “Async Serial”. The dialog opens, then configure some value e.g. Bit Rate. And click save button. After configuration, we can see the data analyzed in the Data section.

item.title: Gerber (GBR) Files
item.description: Gerber Viewer linkThere are many online tools to view GBR file. Online Gerber Viewer

item.title: MQTT Pentesting
item.description: Enumeration link nmap --script mqtt-subscribe -p 1883 <target-ip> Interaction linkmosquitto is a MQTT utilities that include a broker and publish/subscribe clients. We use the mosquitto to interact with MQTT. If you donâ€™t have mosquitto in Linux, install packages. sudo apt install -y mosquitto mosquitto-clients Subscribe to a Topic link # -h: Host # -t: Topic ('#' means "all topics") # -d: Debug mode mosquitto_sub -h example.com -t '#' -d mosquitto_sub -h example.

item.title: NETGEAR Pentesting
item.description: Enumeration link nmap --script modbus-discover --script-args modbus-discover.aggressive=true -p 502 <target-ip> Default Credentials link admin:password
